abstract: Bank of America plans to raise its stake in China Construction Bank to nearly 11 percent, by exercising an option it has to buy more common shares of the Beijing-based bank.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America plans to raise its stake in China Construction Bank to nearly 11 percent, by exercising an option it has to buy more common shares of the Beijing-based bank.

headline.main: Bank of America Raises Its Stake in China Construction
